Package org.jclouds.rimuhosting.miro.data

Interface Summary
PostData Do as much validation as possible to save http requests.
 

Class Summary
CloneOptions Options for a clone.
CreateOptions Some options we need to create a new server/VPS.
IpRequestData Number of IPs VPS needs.  In a separate data structure so that at a later date we can add more IPs to a provisioned server.
NewServerData This structure defines the VPS to be setup.
